div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

div.div: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. South wind 5 to 15 mph becoming west northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 79. North northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south southeast in the afternoon.

A 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southeast wind 10 to 15 mph becoming west after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.

font.marquee: School Closed for the Remainder of 2019-2020 Year

div.p: In an effort to accurately document this historic remote learning process for our yearbook, please send us a picture of your student(s) learning at home! Pictures can be emailed to: jlentz@ainsworthschools.org for K-4 students and jmurphy@ainsworthschools.org for 5-12th grades. Thanks!

h3.a: Ainsworth Community Schools - Who We Are

div.p: With our recent Cognia Accreditation visit we created this video to show off who we are and what we stand for. In the whirlwind of recent events let's not forget all that we are and will continue to be. We appreciate everyone's support. ACS CARES!!
